item.title: EP 03 - Life Discovered And Life Ruined
item.itunes:title: Life Discovered And Life Ruined
item.description:
Today we explore Mars and meth.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Once again, we have headlines proclaiming there is proof of life on Mars. Kind of. Maybe. It's still amazing, in a sense. But give us some space surfing aliens, NASA! We also look at crazy trials, love-lorn researchers, and how evil meth can make you.

Links:

Life on Mars

Climate Change vs. Aliens

A Talking Lion Lawyer

Meth Man Does Meth Things

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Simple
Hood River

Pintrest https://www.pinterest.com/basque5150/jason-carpenter-hood-river/

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
